data.description: Covers negotiation of power purchase agreements (PPA) or grid services contracts for BESS projects. Includes tariff classification, dispatch rights, and metering structure.
data.functional_role: commercial alignment and energy market authorization

notes.informal_notes: PLN has no standardized templates for standalone BESS, leading to project-specific negotiation on dispatch logic and revenue model. Arbitration and escalation options are unclear.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: Contract signature acts as de facto inclusion in the national power system — often a milestone celebrated by project backers.
notes.feedback_structure: Iterative negotiation with informal PLN feedback loops. No external arbitration; failure to agree leads to project freeze.
failure_modes: Prolonged negotiation due to undefined BESS service categories
PLN refusal to buy or commit to storage dispatch window
Contract delay triggers financing risk or capital pullback
